abstract: “Desperate Housewives” lifted ABC to No. 1 in the ratings on Sunday, with 16.6 million viewers at 9 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates. The show delivered the night’s largest audience overall and the top ratings among adults 18 to 49 by a wide margin.
lead_paragraph: “Desperate Housewives” lifted ABC to No. 1 in the ratings on Sunday, with 16.6 million viewers at 9 p.m., according to Nielsen’s estimates. The show delivered the night’s largest audience overall and the top ratings among adults 18 to 49 by a wide margin.

headline.main: Once Again, the ‘Housewives’ Pretty Up ABC’s Ratings
